title: Bring back Hexakill!
body: I thought it was truly amazing at the aspect of having six versus six. It was all out chaos an fun :D

replies.body:
I hope you mean the TT version.  THAT was fun.


Or better yet, why not try out Hexakill Dominion?

Hell, I'd even settle for HexARAM

Was definitely fun, enjoyed it, hope it comes back as well.
In the meantime, URF might be back soon as there are some strings that have names like "Awesomely Awesome buff of awesome buffing" and stuff like that on the PBE. I read it on Surrenderat20 if you want to check it out ^_^
